mapper.select: SELECT c.*, d.stuId, d.classId, e.departName FROM course.Course c LEFT JOIN course.Course_choose d ON d.classId = c.classId LEFT JOIN course.Department e ON c.departId = e.departId LEFT JOIN course.studentComment f ON c.classId = f.classId WHERE d.stuId = #{stuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentComment(classId, isComment, stuId, score1, score2, score3) VALUES (#{classId}, '1', #{stuId}, #{strScore1}, #{strScore2}, #{strScore3})
